title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 838.7 - Permanent file of requests for commission records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 838.7 - Permanent file of requests for commission records

State Regulations

The commission shall maintain a permanent file of all
requests for commission records and all responses thereto, including a list of
all records furnished in response to a request. This file is available for
public review during working hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
838.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
